name: Chill, Murder & Sunshine
description:
A MESSAGE FROM THE DEVS:

Currently you can only build a unit from your main base, that you spawn above in the beginning. The unit can be selected and then right click on any house for them to mine. There's not much feedback right now from player actions, but that'll come :D.

================================================

An RTS game where you play a Mafioso, controlling all your loyal hands, hassling small businesses for money and having territory wars with other mafiosos.

Try to out-strategize either basic enemies or (in the future) your opponent, get more money, recruit more people, build more money laundering places, ahem, I mean pizzerias, expand your territory over randomly generated world and not get killed.

Played on PC, with mouse and keyboard.
